summary:
Project management expert with 8 years of experience in retail
banking, combined with 7 years of consulting services on strategic
infrastructure projects. Strong in project management, development projects &
negotiations. Led planning & establishment of various entities,
managed several EU funded projects in Brussels.

Co-investor of Belcapo BV – Dutch Foodtech Startup.

Holds an MBA degree from Rotterdam School of Management.

Speaks English, Russian, Turkish and Azerbaijani, learning Dutch.
